controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources

implementation.description: Configure IAM policies and roles with least privilege access to ELB resources using resource-based policies and condition statements

controls.title: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external boundary of the system

implementation.description: Configure security groups and NACLs to restrict traffic, implement WAF rules, and use internal load balancers for private traffic

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information

implementation.description: Enable SSL/TLS termination on ALB/NLB with strong cipher suites and redirect HTTP to HTTPS

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Identify the types of events that the system is capable of logging

implementation.description: Enable access logging to S3 bucket and configure CloudTrail for ELB API calls

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor the system to detect attacks and indicators of potential attacks

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch metrics and alarms for ELB performance and security events

controls.title: Contingency Plan
controls.description: Develop a contingency plan for the system that identifies essential missions and business functions

implementation.description: Deploy ELB across multiple AZs and implement cross-region disaster recovery procedures

controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Establish and maintain identity and access management policies and procedures

implementation.description: Implement IAM policies with least privilege for ELB management and establish regular access reviews

controls.title: Clock Synchronization
controls.description: Ensure system clocks are synchronized across all relevant systems

implementation.description: AWS manages clock synchronization for ELB service infrastructure

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Data and objects are classified according to organizational policies

implementation.description: Tag ELB resources with appropriate data classification labels and implement corresponding security controls

controls.title: Encryption Key Management
controls.description: Encryption keys are managed throughout their lifecycle

implementation.description: Use AWS Certificate Manager for SSL/TLS certificates and implement proper key rotation policies

controls.title: Policy Enforcement Point
controls.description: Implement policy enforcement points for network traffic

implementation.description: Configure listener rules and target group health checks to enforce traffic policies

controls.title: Threat and Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Implement threat and vulnerability management processes

implementation.description: Regularly assess ELB configurations using AWS Config rules and Security Hub findings

controls.title: Classic Load Balancers with SSL/HTTPS listeners should use predefined security policies
controls.description: Classic Load Balancers should use predefined security policies that have strong ciphers

implementation.description: Configure CLB with predefined security policies like ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-2017-01 or newer

controls.title: Application Load Balancer should be configured to redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS
controls.description: ALB listeners should redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS to ensure secure communication

implementation.description: Configure ALB listener rules to redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS using redirect actions

controls.title: Application Load Balancers should be configured to drop HTTP headers
controls.description: ALB should be configured to drop invalid HTTP headers to prevent potential attacks

implementation.description: Enable routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled attribute on ALB

controls.title: Application and Network Load Balancers should have logging enabled
controls.description: Load balancers should have access logging enabled to track requests

implementation.description: Enable access logging to S3 bucket with appropriate bucket policies and lifecycle management

controls.title: Application Load Balancer deletion protection should be enabled
controls.description: Enable deletion protection to prevent accidental deletion of load balancers

implementation.description: Set deletion_protection attribute to true in ALB configuration

controls.title: Classic Load Balancers should have connection draining enabled
controls.description: Enable connection draining to complete in-flight requests during instance deregistration

implementation.description: Configure connection draining with appropriate timeout values on CLB

controls.title: Classic Load Balancer listeners should be configured with HTTPS or TLS termination
controls.description: CLB should use secure listeners to encrypt data in transit

implementation.description: Configure HTTPS/TLS listeners on CLB with valid SSL certificates from ACM

controls.title: Classic Load Balancers with SSL/HTTPS listeners should use predefined security policies
controls.description: Use predefined security policies with strong encryption algorithms

implementation.description: Apply security policies like ELBSecurityPolicy-TLS-1-2-2017-01 or ELBSecurityPolicy-FS-1-2-Res-2020-10

controls.title: Network Load Balancers should have TLS listeners for encrypted connections
controls.description: NLB should use TLS listeners to encrypt traffic between clients and load balancer

implementation.description: Configure TLS listeners on NLB with SSL certificates and appropriate security policies

controls.title: Load balancers should span multiple Availability Zones
controls.description: Load balancers should be deployed across multiple AZs for high availability

implementation.description: Configure load balancer subnets across at least two different Availability Zones

controls.title: Load balancer target groups should have health check enabled
controls.description: Target groups should have health checks configured to ensure traffic is routed to healthy targets

implementation.description: Configure health check settings including path, interval, timeout, and healthy/unhealthy thresholds

controls.title: Application Load Balancers should be configured with defensive or strictest desync mitigation mode
controls.description: ALB should be configured to handle HTTP desync attacks

implementation.description: Set routing.http.desync_mitigation_mode to defensive or strictest on ALB

cost.name: AWS ELB Cost Optimization Best Practices

controls.title: Right-size Load Balancer Type
controls.description: Choose the appropriate load balancer type based on actual requirements to avoid unnecessary costs

implementation.description: Evaluate traffic patterns and requirements to select between ALB, NLB, and CLB based on feature needs and cost structure

controls.title: Optimize Load Balancer Capacity Units (LCU)
controls.description: Monitor and optimize LCU usage to reduce costs for ALB and NLB

implementation.description: Monitor CloudWatch metrics for processed bytes, active connections, new connections, and rule evaluations to optimize LCU consumption

controls.title: Consolidate Load Balancers
controls.description: Consolidate multiple load balancers where possible to reduce fixed hourly costs

implementation.description: Use host-based and path-based routing rules to serve multiple applications from a single ALB instead of deploying separate load balancers

controls.title: Optimize Cross-Zone Load Balancing
controls.description: Evaluate cross-zone load balancing settings to optimize data transfer costs

implementation.description: Disable cross-zone load balancing for NLB if traffic distribution allows, and consider regional traffic patterns for ALB

controls.title: Implement Efficient Health Checks
controls.description: Optimize health check frequency and target to reduce unnecessary load and potential costs

implementation.description: Configure appropriate health check intervals and paths to minimize resource consumption while maintaining reliability

controls.title: Monitor and Optimize Idle Load Balancers
controls.description: Identify and remove unused or underutilized load balancers

implementation.description: Set up CloudWatch alarms and regular reviews to identify load balancers with minimal traffic and evaluate their necessity

controls.title: Optimize Target Group Configuration
controls.description: Configure target groups efficiently to minimize processing overhead

implementation.description: Optimize target group size, deregistration delay, and connection draining settings to reduce unnecessary resource consumption

controls.title: Leverage Reserved Capacity
controls.description: Consider reserved capacity options for predictable, long-term load balancer usage

implementation.description: Analyze usage patterns and consider AWS Savings Plans or other commitment-based pricing models for consistent workloads
